meta.title: COVID-19 (2019 Novel Coronavirus) | Elk Grove Unified School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Elk Grove Unified will continue to implement any and all measures recommended by public health leaders to protect the health and safety of our students, our staff, and our community throughout this public health emergency. Updates will be published here on our COVID-19 page.
COVID-19 (2019 Novel Coronavirus) | Elk Grove Unified School District

Elk Grove Unified will continue to implement any and all measures recommended by public health leaders to protect the health and safety of our students, our staff, and our community throughout this public health emergency. Updates will be published here on our COVID-19 page.

p.a: View Parent Updates and All Community Letters

div.p: In following the updated Sacramento County Public Health Order, effective April 9, 2020, all District sites, including the Robert L. Trigg Education Center, will be closed to the public until May 1, 2020. Enrollment and other educational and business services will continue. To contact a department by email or phone, please visit the EGUSD’s Division and Department’s web page. Departments will be monitoring emails and voicemails. We will respond to your request within a reasonable amount of time and we will be mindful of situations requiring deadlines. Thank you. Please stay safe and stay healthy.

p.a: March 27, 2020 – Elk Grove Unified Distance Learning Plans Progress

hr.p: April 7, 2020 – The Sacramento County Public Health Officer has issued a new Public Health Order – effective at 11:59 p.m., April 7, and will be in effect until 11:59 p.m., May 1, 2020. The Public Health Order reinforces the direction for all individuals to stay home and extends the terms of the order to increase social distancing and reducing person-to-person contact to further slow transmission of COVID-19.

p.strong: March 19, 2020 – Sacramento County Health Officer Issues COVID-19 Order

span.span: As of March 19, 2020, at 11:59 p.m., the Sacramento County Health Officer is directing all individuals living in the county to stay at their place of residence except for essential activities.

ul.li: Public Health News Release | Public Health Order | Stay at Home Order FAQs

February 21, 2020 – Sacramento County Public Health Letter

div.p: While information is rapidly changing, and experts are learning more every day, below are some resource links that address COVID-19 concerns for our younger population and higher risk groups. As more information and resources become available, we will continue to update this page.

p.a: EGUSD Family and Community Resources Page
How to receive District COVID-19 school closure updates/info. through School Messenger

div.div:
EGUSD Mailing Address:
Elk Grove Unified School District
9510 Elk Grove-Florin Road
Elk Grove, CA 95624
Google Map/Directions
For general information regarding the Elk Grove Unified School District, please call:
1 (916) 686-5085
For safety/emergency needs, please call:
Safety and Security Department
1 (916) 686-7786
School Contact Information
Department Contact Information
If you are experiencing problems with the website, please email our webmaster.
